blogPost.title:
Tesla's market cap closing in on Facebook which is currently the 5th largest company in the US. $TSLA $FB

Chart via @ycharts https://t.co/FiiNidSqXY
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
特斯拉的市值接近Facebook，后者目前是美国第五大公司。美国电话服务级别协议脸书

图表通过@ycharts https://t.co/FiiNidSqXY

特斯拉的市值接近Facebook，後者目前是美國第五大公司。美國電話服務級別協議臉書

圖表通過@ycharts https://t.co/FiiNidSqXY
